text: Valeria Sergeyevna Kozlova (; born on January 22, 1988) is a Russian singer, composer, songwriter, drummer and actress. She was a member of the music group Ranetki from 2005 until 2008. She was in a relationship with Ranetki's producer Sergei Milnichenko (b.1966) from 2005 until 2008. == Other websites == * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Russian singers Category:21st-century Russian singers Category:Russian composers Category:Russian actors
title: Valeria Kozlova
